titleStmt.title: The ancient testimony and principle of the people called Quakers renewed with respect to the king and government, and touching the present association.
titleStmt.author: London Yearly Meeting (Society of Friends)

notesStmt.note: "From a meeting of the said people in London, the 23d of the first month, called March, 1695/6"--Colophon.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
